        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var path = current.account_path+"/";
	var acctParent;
	var parentPath;
	var newPath;
	var currentPath;
	if(!gs.nil(current.account_parent)) {
		acctParent = new GlideRecord('customer_account');
		acctParent.get(current.getValue('account_parent'));
		parentPath = acctParent.getValue('account_path');
		newPath = parentPath + "/" + current.account_code;
	} else {
		newPath = current.account_code;
	}
	
	var gr = new GlideRecord('customer_account');
	gr.addQuery('account_path', 'STARTSWITH', path);
	gr.orderBy('account_code');
	gr.query();
	while(gr.next()) {
		currentPath = gr.getValue('account_path');
		currentPath = currentPath.replace(path, newPath + "/");
		gr.setValue('account_path', currentPath);
		gr.update();
	}
	current.account_path = newPath;
})(current, previous);]]></script>
